author: costin
msg: Few changes to make it build on hpux.
A small fix in lb worker - try once more to connect to the host
where the session is located before giving up. This should solve
a lb bug which may happen in some cases.

author: costin
msg: Document some of the changes. Move some of the code did by Jean-Francisc in jk_jni_aprImpl.
The whole thing will disapear as soon as apr adds the support.

msg: More code to display status information on the jni worker. Very good for

msg: Add the things we know at compile time into the properties.
